00083 #if __cplusplus >= 201103L
00084 # define NAN_DISALLOW_ASSIGN(CLASS) void operator=(const CLASS&) = delete;
00085 # define NAN_DISALLOW_COPY(CLASS) CLASS(const CLASS&) = delete;
00086 # define NAN_DISALLOW_MOVE(CLASS)                                              \
00087     CLASS(CLASS&&) = delete;  /* NOLINT(build/c++11) */                        \
00088     void operator=(CLASS&&) = delete;
00089 #else
00090 # define NAN_DISALLOW_ASSIGN(CLASS) void operator=(const CLASS&);
00091 # define NAN_DISALLOW_COPY(CLASS) CLASS(const CLASS&);
00092 # define NAN_DISALLOW_MOVE(CLASS)
00093 #endif

00220 /* Implement thread local storage for older versions of libuv.
00221  * This is essentially a backport of libuv commit 5d2434bf
00222  * written by Ben Noordhuis, adjusted for names and inline.
00223  */

00225 #ifndef WIN32
00226 
00227 typedef pthread_key_t nauv_key_t;
00228 
00229 inline int nauv_key_create(nauv_key_t* key) {
00230   return -pthread_key_create(key, NULL);
00231 }
00232 
00233 inline void nauv_key_delete(nauv_key_t* key) {
00234   if (pthread_key_delete(*key))
00235     abort();
00236 }
00237 
00238 inline void* nauv_key_get(nauv_key_t* key) {
00239   return pthread_getspecific(*key);
00240 }
00241 
00242 inline void nauv_key_set(nauv_key_t* key, void* value) {
00243   if (pthread_setspecific(*key, value))
00244     abort();
00245 }
00246 
00247 #else
00248 
00249 typedef struct {
00250   DWORD tls_index;
00251 } nauv_key_t;
00252 
00253 inline int nauv_key_create(nauv_key_t* key) {
00254   key->tls_index = TlsAlloc();
00255   if (key->tls_index == TLS_OUT_OF_INDEXES)
00256     return UV_ENOMEM;
00257   return 0;
00258 }
00259 
00260 inline void nauv_key_delete(nauv_key_t* key) {
00261   if (TlsFree(key->tls_index) == FALSE)
00262     abort();
00263   key->tls_index = TLS_OUT_OF_INDEXES;
00264 }
00265 
00266 inline void* nauv_key_get(nauv_key_t* key) {
00267   void* value = TlsGetValue(key->tls_index);
00268   if (value == NULL)
00269     if (GetLastError() != ERROR_SUCCESS)
00270       abort();
00271   return value;
00272 }
00273 
00274 inline void nauv_key_set(nauv_key_t* key, void* value) {
00275   if (TlsSetValue(key->tls_index, value) == FALSE)
00276     abort();
00277 }
00278 
00279 #endif
00280 #endif

00287 #if defined(V8_MAJOR_VERSION) && (V8_MAJOR_VERSION > 4 ||                      \
00288   (V8_MAJOR_VERSION == 4 && defined(V8_MINOR_VERSION) && V8_MINOR_VERSION >= 3))
00289   typedef v8::WeakCallbackType WeakCallbackType;
00290 #else
00291 struct WeakCallbackType {
00292   enum E {kParameter, kInternalFields};
00293   E type;
00294   WeakCallbackType(E other) : type(other) {}  // NOLINT(runtime/explicit)
00295   inline bool operator==(E other) { return other == this->type; }
00296   inline bool operator!=(E other) { return !operator==(other); }
00297 };
00298 #endif

00322 //=== HandleScope ==============================================================
00323 
00324 class HandleScope {
00325   v8::HandleScope scope;
00326 
00327  public:
00328 #if NODE_MODULE_VERSION > NODE_0_10_MODULE_VERSION
00329   inline HandleScope() : scope(v8::Isolate::GetCurrent()) {}
00330   inline static int NumberOfHandles() {
00331     return v8::HandleScope::NumberOfHandles(v8::Isolate::GetCurrent());
00332   }
00333 #else
00334   inline HandleScope() : scope() {}
00335   inline static int NumberOfHandles() {
00336     return v8::HandleScope::NumberOfHandles();
00337   }
00338 #endif
00339 
00340  private:
00341   // Make it hard to create heap-allocated or illegal handle scopes by
00342   // disallowing certain operations.
00343   HandleScope(const HandleScope &);
00344   void operator=(const HandleScope &);
00345   void *operator new(size_t size);
00346   void operator delete(void *, size_t);
00347 };
00348 
00349 class EscapableHandleScope {
00350  public:
00351 #if NODE_MODULE_VERSION > NODE_0_10_MODULE_VERSION
00352   inline EscapableHandleScope() : scope(v8::Isolate::GetCurrent()) {}
00353 
00354   inline static int NumberOfHandles() {
00355     return v8::EscapableHandleScope::NumberOfHandles(v8::Isolate::GetCurrent());
00356   }
00357 
00358   template<typename T>
00359   inline v8::Local<T> Escape(v8::Local<T> value) {
00360     return scope.Escape(value);
00361   }
00362 
00363  private:
00364   v8::EscapableHandleScope scope;
00365 #else
00366   inline EscapableHandleScope() : scope() {}
00367 
00368   inline static int NumberOfHandles() {
00369     return v8::HandleScope::NumberOfHandles();
00370   }
00371 
00372   template<typename T>
00373   inline v8::Local<T> Escape(v8::Local<T> value) {
00374     return scope.Close(value);
00375   }
00376 
00377  private:
00378   v8::HandleScope scope;
00379 #endif
00380 
00381  private:
00382   // Make it hard to create heap-allocated or illegal handle scopes by
00383   // disallowing certain operations.
00384   EscapableHandleScope(const EscapableHandleScope &);
00385   void operator=(const EscapableHandleScope &);
00386   void *operator new(size_t size);
00387   void operator delete(void *, size_t);
00388 };

00392 class TryCatch {
00393   v8::TryCatch try_catch_;
00394   friend void FatalException(const TryCatch&);
00395 
00396  public:
00397 #if NODE_MODULE_VERSION > NODE_0_12_MODULE_VERSION
00398   TryCatch() : try_catch_(v8::Isolate::GetCurrent()) {}
00399 #endif
00400 
00401   NAN_INLINE bool HasCaught() const { return try_catch_.HasCaught(); }
00402 
00403   NAN_INLINE bool CanContinue() const { return try_catch_.CanContinue(); }
00404 
00405   NAN_INLINE v8::Local<v8::Value> ReThrow() {
00406 #if NODE_MODULE_VERSION < IOJS_3_0_MODULE_VERSION
00407     return New(try_catch_.ReThrow());
00408 #else
00409     return try_catch_.ReThrow();
00410 #endif
00411   }
00412 
00413   NAN_INLINE v8::Local<v8::Value> Exception() const {
00414     return try_catch_.Exception();
00415   }
00416 
00417 #if defined(V8_MAJOR_VERSION) && (V8_MAJOR_VERSION > 4 ||                      \
00418   (V8_MAJOR_VERSION == 4 && defined(V8_MINOR_VERSION) && V8_MINOR_VERSION >= 3))
00419   NAN_INLINE v8::MaybeLocal<v8::Value> StackTrace() const {
00420     return try_catch_.StackTrace(GetCurrentContext());
00421   }
00422 #else
00423   NAN_INLINE MaybeLocal<v8::Value> StackTrace() const {
00424     return MaybeLocal<v8::Value>(try_catch_.StackTrace());
00425   }
00426 #endif
00427 
00428   NAN_INLINE v8::Local<v8::Message> Message() const {
00429     return try_catch_.Message();
00430   }
00431 
00432   NAN_INLINE void Reset() { try_catch_.Reset(); }
00433 
00434   NAN_INLINE void SetVerbose(bool value) { try_catch_.SetVerbose(value); }
00435 
00436   NAN_INLINE void SetCaptureMessage(bool value) {
00437     try_catch_.SetCaptureMessage(value);
00438   }
00439 };

00651   NAN_INLINE MaybeLocal<v8::Object> NewBuffer(
00652       char *data
00653     , size_t length
00654 #if NODE_MODULE_VERSION > IOJS_2_0_MODULE_VERSION
00655     , node::Buffer::FreeCallback callback
00656 #else
00657     , node::smalloc::FreeCallback callback
00658 #endif
00659     , void *hint
00660   ) {
00661     // arbitrary buffer lengths requires
00662     // NODE_MODULE_VERSION >= IOJS_3_0_MODULE_VERSION
00663     assert(length <= imp::kMaxLength && "too large buffer");
00664 #if NODE_MODULE_VERSION > IOJS_2_0_MODULE_VERSION
00665     return node::Buffer::New(
00666         v8::Isolate::GetCurrent(), data, length, callback, hint);
00667 #else
00668     return MaybeLocal<v8::Object>(node::Buffer::New(
00669         v8::Isolate::GetCurrent(), data, length, callback, hint));
00670 #endif
00671   }

00676   ) {

00860 
00861 class Utf8String {
00862  public:
00863   NAN_INLINE explicit Utf8String(v8::Local<v8::Value> from) :
00864       length_(0), str_(str_st_) {
00865     if (!from.IsEmpty()) {
00866       v8::Local<v8::String> string = from->ToString();
00867       if (!string.IsEmpty()) {
00868         size_t len = 3 * string->Length() + 1;
00869         assert(len <= INT_MAX);
00870         if (len > sizeof (str_st_)) {
00871           str_ = static_cast<char*>(malloc(len));
00872           assert(str_ != 0);
00873         }
00874         const int flags =
00875             v8::String::NO_NULL_TERMINATION | imp::kReplaceInvalidUtf8;
00876         length_ = string->WriteUtf8(str_, static_cast<int>(len), 0, flags);
00877         str_[length_] = '\0';
00878       }
00879     }
00880   }
00881 
00882   NAN_INLINE int length() const {
00883     return length_;
00884   }
00885 
00886   NAN_INLINE char* operator*() { return str_; }
00887   NAN_INLINE const char* operator*() const { return str_; }
00888 
00889   NAN_INLINE ~Utf8String() {
00890     if (str_ != str_st_) {
00891       free(str_);
00892     }
00893   }
00894 
00895  private:
00896   NAN_DISALLOW_ASSIGN_COPY_MOVE(Utf8String)
00897 
00898   int length_;
00899   char *str_;
00900   char str_st_[1024];
00901 };
00902 
00903 #else  // Node 0.8 and 0.10

00907   }

00912   }

00917   }

01023   NAN_INLINE MaybeLocal<v8::Object> NewBuffer(
01024       char *data
01025     , size_t length
01026     , node::Buffer::free_callback callback
01027     , void *hint
01028   ) {
01029     EscapableHandleScope scope;
01030     // arbitrary buffer lengths requires
01031     // NODE_MODULE_VERSION >= IOJS_3_0_MODULE_VERSION
01032     assert(length <= imp::kMaxLength && "too large buffer");
01033     return MaybeLocal<v8::Object>(
01034         scope.Escape(New(node::Buffer::New(data, length, callback, hint)->handle_)));
01035   }
01036 
01037   NAN_INLINE MaybeLocal<v8::Object> CopyBuffer(
01038       const char *data
01039     , uint32_t size
01040   ) {
01041     EscapableHandleScope scope;
01042     // arbitrary buffer lengths requires
01043     // NODE_MODULE_VERSION >= IOJS_3_0_MODULE_VERSION
01044     assert(size <= imp::kMaxLength && "too large buffer");
01045 #if NODE_MODULE_VERSION >= NODE_0_10_MODULE_VERSION
01046     return MaybeLocal<v8::Object>(
01047         scope.Escape(New(node::Buffer::New(data, size)->handle_)));
01048 #else
01049     return MaybeLocal<v8::Object>(scope.Escape(
01050         New(node::Buffer::New(const_cast<char*>(data), size)->handle_)));
01051 #endif
01052   }
01053 
01054   NAN_INLINE MaybeLocal<v8::Object> NewBuffer(uint32_t size) {
01055     // arbitrary buffer lengths requires
01056     // NODE_MODULE_VERSION >= IOJS_3_0_MODULE_VERSION
01057     EscapableHandleScope scope;
01058     assert(size <= imp::kMaxLength && "too large buffer");
01059     return MaybeLocal<v8::Object>(
01060         scope.Escape(New(node::Buffer::New(size)->handle_)));
01061   }
01062 
01063   NAN_INLINE void FreeData(char *data, void *hint) {
01064     (void) hint;  // unused
01065     delete[] data;
01066   }
01067 
01068   NAN_INLINE MaybeLocal<v8::Object> NewBuffer(
01069       char* data
01070     , uint32_t size
01071   ) {
01072     EscapableHandleScope scope;
01073     // arbitrary buffer lengths requires
01074     // NODE_MODULE_VERSION >= IOJS_3_0_MODULE_VERSION
01075     assert(size <= imp::kMaxLength && "too large buffer");
01076     return MaybeLocal<v8::Object>(scope.Escape(New(
01077         node::Buffer::New(data, size, FreeData, NULL)->handle_)));
01078   }

01080 namespace imp {
01081 NAN_INLINE void
01082 widenString(std::vector<uint16_t> *ws, const uint8_t *s, int l) {
01083   size_t len = static_cast<size_t>(l);
01084   if (l < 0) {
01085     len = strlen(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(s));
01086   }
01087   assert(len <= INT_MAX && "string too long");
01088   ws->resize(len);
01089   std::copy(s, s + len, ws->begin());  // NOLINT(build/include_what_you_use)
01090 }
01091 }  // end of namespace imp
01092 
01093   NAN_INLINE MaybeLocal<v8::String>
01094   NewOneByteString(const uint8_t * value, int length = -1) {
01095     std::vector<uint16_t> wideString;  // NOLINT(build/include_what_you_use)
01096     imp::widenString(&wideString, value, length);
01097     return imp::Factory<v8::String>::return_t(v8::String::New(
01098         &wideString.front(), static_cast<int>(wideString.size())));
01099   }

01172 class Utf8String {
01173  public:
01174   NAN_INLINE explicit Utf8String(v8::Local<v8::Value> from) :
01175       length_(0), str_(str_st_) {
01176     if (!from.IsEmpty()) {
01177       v8::Local<v8::String> string = from->ToString();
01178       if (!string.IsEmpty()) {
01179         size_t len = 3 * string->Length() + 1;
01180         assert(len <= INT_MAX);
01181         if (len > sizeof (str_st_)) {
01182           str_ = static_cast<char*>(malloc(len));
01183           assert(str_ != 0);
01184         }
01185         const int flags =
01186             v8::String::NO_NULL_TERMINATION | imp::kReplaceInvalidUtf8;
01187         length_ = string->WriteUtf8(str_, static_cast<int>(len), 0, flags);
01188         str_[length_] = '\0';
01189       }
01190     }
01191   }
01192 
01193   NAN_INLINE int length() const {
01194     return length_;
01195   }
01196 
01197   NAN_INLINE char* operator*() { return str_; }
01198   NAN_INLINE const char* operator*() const { return str_; }
01199 
01200   NAN_INLINE ~Utf8String() {
01201     if (str_ != str_st_) {
01202       free(str_);
01203     }
01204   }
01205 
01206  private:
01207   NAN_DISALLOW_ASSIGN_COPY_MOVE(Utf8String)
01208 
01209   int length_;
01210   char *str_;
01211   char str_st_[1024];
01212 };

01219 typedef void NAN_METHOD_RETURN_TYPE;

01222 typedef void NAN_GETTER_RETURN_TYPE;

01224 typedef const PropertyCallbackInfo<void>& NAN_SETTER_ARGS_TYPE;
01225 typedef void NAN_SETTER_RETURN_TYPE;
01226 
01227 typedef const PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Value>&
01228     NAN_PROPERTY_GETTER_ARGS_TYPE;
01229 typedef void NAN_PROPERTY_GETTER_RETURN_TYPE;
01230 
01231 typedef const PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Value>&
01232     NAN_PROPERTY_SETTER_ARGS_TYPE;
01233 typedef void NAN_PROPERTY_SETTER_RETURN_TYPE;
01234 
01235 typedef const PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Array>&
01236     NAN_PROPERTY_ENUMERATOR_ARGS_TYPE;
01237 typedef void NAN_PROPERTY_ENUMERATOR_RETURN_TYPE;
01238 
01239 typedef const PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Boolean>&
01240     NAN_PROPERTY_DELETER_ARGS_TYPE;
01241 typedef void NAN_PROPERTY_DELETER_RETURN_TYPE;
01242 
01243 typedef const PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Integer>&
01244     NAN_PROPERTY_QUERY_ARGS_TYPE;
01245 typedef void NAN_PROPERTY_QUERY_RETURN_TYPE;
01246 
01247 typedef const PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& NAN_INDEX_GETTER_ARGS_TYPE;
01248 typedef void NAN_INDEX_GETTER_RETURN_TYPE;
01249 
01250 typedef const PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& NAN_INDEX_SETTER_ARGS_TYPE;
01251 typedef void NAN_INDEX_SETTER_RETURN_TYPE;
01252 
01253 typedef const PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Array>&
01254     NAN_INDEX_ENUMERATOR_ARGS_TYPE;
01255 typedef void NAN_INDEX_ENUMERATOR_RETURN_TYPE;
01256 
01257 typedef const PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Boolean>&
01258     NAN_INDEX_DELETER_ARGS_TYPE;
01259 typedef void NAN_INDEX_DELETER_RETURN_TYPE;
01260 
01261 typedef const PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Integer>&
01262     NAN_INDEX_QUERY_ARGS_TYPE;
01263 typedef void NAN_INDEX_QUERY_RETURN_TYPE;

01265 #define NAN_METHOD(name)                                                       \
01266     Nan::NAN_METHOD_RETURN_TYPE name(Nan::NAN_METHOD_ARGS_TYPE info)
01267 #define NAN_GETTER(name)                                                       \
01268     Nan::NAN_GETTER_RETURN_TYPE name(                                          \
01269         v8::Local<v8::String> property                                         \
01270       , Nan::NAN_GETTER_ARGS_TYPE info)
01271 #define NAN_SETTER(name)                                                       \
01272     Nan::NAN_SETTER_RETURN_TYPE name(                                          \
01273         v8::Local<v8::String> property                                         \
01274       , v8::Local<v8::Value> value                                             \
01275       , Nan::NAN_SETTER_ARGS_TYPE info)
01276 #define NAN_PROPERTY_GETTER(name)                                              \
01277     Nan::NAN_PROPERTY_GETTER_RETURN_TYPE name(                                 \
01278         v8::Local<v8::String> property                                         \
01279       , Nan::NAN_PROPERTY_GETTER_ARGS_TYPE info)
01280 #define NAN_PROPERTY_SETTER(name)                                              \
01281     Nan::NAN_PROPERTY_SETTER_RETURN_TYPE name(                                 \
01282         v8::Local<v8::String> property                                         \
01283       , v8::Local<v8::Value> value                                             \
01284       , Nan::NAN_PROPERTY_SETTER_ARGS_TYPE info)
01285 #define NAN_PROPERTY_ENUMERATOR(name)                                          \
01286     Nan::NAN_PROPERTY_ENUMERATOR_RETURN_TYPE name(                             \
01287         Nan::NAN_PROPERTY_ENUMERATOR_ARGS_TYPE info)
01288 #define NAN_PROPERTY_DELETER(name)                                             \
01289     Nan::NAN_PROPERTY_DELETER_RETURN_TYPE name(                                \
01290         v8::Local<v8::String> property                                         \
01291       , Nan::NAN_PROPERTY_DELETER_ARGS_TYPE info)
01292 #define NAN_PROPERTY_QUERY(name)                                               \
01293     Nan::NAN_PROPERTY_QUERY_RETURN_TYPE name(                                  \
01294         v8::Local<v8::String> property                                         \
01295       , Nan::NAN_PROPERTY_QUERY_ARGS_TYPE info)
01296 # define NAN_INDEX_GETTER(name)                                                \
01297     Nan::NAN_INDEX_GETTER_RETURN_TYPE name(                                    \
01298         uint32_t index                                                         \
01299       , Nan::NAN_INDEX_GETTER_ARGS_TYPE info)
01300 #define NAN_INDEX_SETTER(name)                                                 \
01301     Nan::NAN_INDEX_SETTER_RETURN_TYPE name(                                    \
01302         uint32_t index                                                         \
01303       , v8::Local<v8::Value> value                                             \
01304       , Nan::NAN_INDEX_SETTER_ARGS_TYPE info)
01305 #define NAN_INDEX_ENUMERATOR(name)                                             \
01306     Nan::NAN_INDEX_ENUMERATOR_RETURN_TYPE                                      \
01307     name(Nan::NAN_INDEX_ENUMERATOR_ARGS_TYPE info)
01308 #define NAN_INDEX_DELETER(name)                                                \
01309     Nan::NAN_INDEX_DELETER_RETURN_TYPE name(                                   \
01310         uint32_t index                                                         \
01311       , Nan::NAN_INDEX_DELETER_ARGS_TYPE info)
01312 #define NAN_INDEX_QUERY(name)                                                  \
01313     Nan::NAN_INDEX_QUERY_RETURN_TYPE name(                                     \
01314         uint32_t index                                                         \
01315       , Nan::NAN_INDEX_QUERY_ARGS_TYPE info)
01316 
01317 class Callback {
01318  public:
01319   Callback() {
01320     HandleScope scope;
01321     v8::Local<v8::Object> obj = New<v8::Object>();
01322     handle.Reset(obj);
01323   }
01324 
01325   explicit Callback(const v8::Local<v8::Function> &fn) {
01326     HandleScope scope;
01327     v8::Local<v8::Object> obj = New<v8::Object>();
01328     handle.Reset(obj);
01329     SetFunction(fn);
01330   }
01331 
01332   ~Callback() {
01333     if (handle.IsEmpty()) return;
01334     handle.Reset();
01335   }
01336 
01337   bool operator==(const Callback &other) const {
01338     HandleScope scope;
01339     v8::Local<v8::Value> a = New(handle)->Get(kCallbackIndex);
01340     v8::Local<v8::Value> b = New(other.handle)->Get(kCallbackIndex);
01341     return a->StrictEquals(b);
01342   }
01343 
01344   bool operator!=(const Callback &other) const {
01345     return !this->operator==(other);
01346   }
01347 
01348   NAN_INLINE
01349   v8::Local<v8::Function> operator*() const { return this->GetFunction(); }
01350 
01351   NAN_INLINE v8::Local<v8::Value> operator()(
01352       v8::Local<v8::Object> target
01353     , int argc = 0
01354     , v8::Local<v8::Value> argv[] = 0) const {
01355     return this->Call(target, argc, argv);
01356   }
01357 
01358   NAN_INLINE v8::Local<v8::Value> operator()(
01359       int argc = 0
01360     , v8::Local<v8::Value> argv[] = 0) const {
01361     return this->Call(argc, argv);
01362   }
01363 
01364   NAN_INLINE void SetFunction(const v8::Local<v8::Function> &fn) {
01365     HandleScope scope;
01366     Set(New(handle), kCallbackIndex, fn);
01367   }
01368 
01369   NAN_INLINE v8::Local<v8::Function> GetFunction() const {
01370     EscapableHandleScope scope;
01371     return scope.Escape(New(handle)->Get(kCallbackIndex)
01372         .As<v8::Function>());
01373   }
01374 
01375   NAN_INLINE bool IsEmpty() const {
01376     HandleScope scope;
01377     return New(handle)->Get(kCallbackIndex)->IsUndefined();
01378   }
01379 
01380   NAN_INLINE v8::Local<v8::Value>
01381   Call(v8::Local<v8::Object> target
01382      , int argc
01383      , v8::Local<v8::Value> argv[]) const {
01384 #if (NODE_MODULE_VERSION > NODE_0_10_MODULE_VERSION)
01385     v8::Isolate *isolate = v8::Isolate::GetCurrent();
01386     return Call_(isolate, target, argc, argv);
01387 #else
01388     return Call_(target, argc, argv);
01389 #endif
01390   }
01391 
01392   NAN_INLINE v8::Local<v8::Value>
01393   Call(int argc, v8::Local<v8::Value> argv[]) const {
01394 #if (NODE_MODULE_VERSION > NODE_0_10_MODULE_VERSION)
01395     v8::Isolate *isolate = v8::Isolate::GetCurrent();
01396     return Call_(isolate, isolate->GetCurrentContext()->Global(), argc, argv);
01397 #else
01398     return Call_(v8::Context::GetCurrent()->Global(), argc, argv);
01399 #endif
01400   }
01401 
01402  private:
01403   NAN_DISALLOW_ASSIGN_COPY_MOVE(Callback)
01404   Persistent<v8::Object> handle;
01405   static const uint32_t kCallbackIndex = 0;
01406 
01407 #if (NODE_MODULE_VERSION > NODE_0_10_MODULE_VERSION)
01408   v8::Local<v8::Value> Call_(v8::Isolate *isolate
01409                            , v8::Local<v8::Object> target
01410                            , int argc
01411                            , v8::Local<v8::Value> argv[]) const {
01412     EscapableHandleScope scope;
01413 
01414     v8::Local<v8::Function> callback = New(handle)->
01415         Get(kCallbackIndex).As<v8::Function>();
01416 # if NODE_MODULE_VERSION < IOJS_3_0_MODULE_VERSION
01417     return scope.Escape(New(node::MakeCallback(
01418         isolate
01419       , target
01420       , callback
01421       , argc
01422       , argv
01423     )));
01424 # else
01425     return scope.Escape(node::MakeCallback(
01426         isolate
01427       , target
01428       , callback
01429       , argc
01430       , argv
01431     ));
01432 # endif
01433   }
01434 #else
01435   v8::Local<v8::Value> Call_(v8::Local<v8::Object> target
01436                            , int argc
01437                            , v8::Local<v8::Value> argv[]) const {
01438     EscapableHandleScope scope;
01439 
01440     v8::Local<v8::Function> callback = New(handle)->
01441         Get(kCallbackIndex).As<v8::Function>();
01442     return scope.Escape(New(node::MakeCallback(
01443         target
01444       , callback
01445       , argc
01446       , argv
01447     )));
01448   }
01449 #endif
01450 };
01451 
01452 /* abstract */ class AsyncWorker {
01453  public:
01454   explicit AsyncWorker(Callback *callback_)
01455       : callback(callback_), errmsg_(NULL) {
01456     request.data = this;
01457 
01458     HandleScope scope;
01459     v8::Local<v8::Object> obj = New<v8::Object>();
01460     persistentHandle.Reset(obj);
01461   }
01462 
01463   virtual ~AsyncWorker() {
01464     HandleScope scope;
01465 
01466     if (!persistentHandle.IsEmpty())
01467       persistentHandle.Reset();
01468     if (callback)
01469       delete callback;
01470     if (errmsg_)
01471       delete[] errmsg_;
01472   }
01473 
01474   virtual void WorkComplete() {
01475     HandleScope scope;
01476 
01477     if (errmsg_ == NULL)
01478       HandleOKCallback();
01479     else
01480       HandleErrorCallback();
01481     delete callback;
01482     callback = NULL;
01483   }
01484 
01485   NAN_INLINE void SaveToPersistent(
01486       const char *key, const v8::Local<v8::Value> &value) {
01487     HandleScope scope;
01488     New(persistentHandle)->Set(New(key).ToLocalChecked(), value);
01489   }
01490 
01491   NAN_INLINE void SaveToPersistent(
01492       const v8::Local<v8::String> &key, const v8::Local<v8::Value> &value) {
01493     HandleScope scope;
01494     New(persistentHandle)->Set(key, value);
01495   }
01496 
01497   NAN_INLINE void SaveToPersistent(
01498       uint32_t index, const v8::Local<v8::Value> &value) {
01499     HandleScope scope;
01500     New(persistentHandle)->Set(index, value);
01501   }
01502 
01503   NAN_INLINE v8::Local<v8::Value> GetFromPersistent(const char *key) const {
01504     EscapableHandleScope scope;
01505     return scope.Escape(
01506         New(persistentHandle)->Get(New(key).ToLocalChecked()));
01507   }
01508 
01509   NAN_INLINE v8::Local<v8::Value>
01510   GetFromPersistent(const v8::Local<v8::String> &key) const {
01511     EscapableHandleScope scope;
01512     return scope.Escape(New(persistentHandle)->Get(key));
01513   }
01514 
01515   NAN_INLINE v8::Local<v8::Value> GetFromPersistent(uint32_t index) const {
01516     EscapableHandleScope scope;
01517     return scope.Escape(New(persistentHandle)->Get(index));
01518   }
01519 
01520   virtual void Execute() = 0;
01521 
01522   uv_work_t request;
01523 
01524   virtual void Destroy() {
01525       delete this;
01526   }
01527 
01528  protected:
01529   Persistent<v8::Object> persistentHandle;
01530   Callback *callback;
01531 
01532   virtual void HandleOKCallback() {
01533     callback->Call(0, NULL);
01534   }
01535 
01536   virtual void HandleErrorCallback() {
01537     HandleScope scope;
01538 
01539     v8::Local<v8::Value> argv[] = {
01540       v8::Exception::Error(New<v8::String>(ErrorMessage()).ToLocalChecked())
01541     };
01542     callback->Call(1, argv);
01543   }
01544 
01545   void SetErrorMessage(const char *msg) {
01546     if (errmsg_) {
01547       delete[] errmsg_;
01548     }
01549 
01550     size_t size = strlen(msg) + 1;
01551     errmsg_ = new char[size];
01552     memcpy(errmsg_, msg, size);
01553   }
01554 
01555   const char* ErrorMessage() const {
01556     return errmsg_;
01557   }
01558 
01559  private:
01560   NAN_DISALLOW_ASSIGN_COPY_MOVE(AsyncWorker)
01561   char *errmsg_;
01562 };
01563 
01564 /* abstract */ class AsyncProgressWorker : public AsyncWorker {
01565  public:
01566   explicit AsyncProgressWorker(Callback *callback_)
01567       : AsyncWorker(callback_), asyncdata_(NULL), asyncsize_(0) {
01568     async = new uv_async_t;
01569     uv_async_init(
01570         uv_default_loop()
01571       , async
01572       , AsyncProgress_
01573     );
01574     async->data = this;
01575 
01576     uv_mutex_init(&async_lock);
01577   }
01578 
01579   virtual ~AsyncProgressWorker() {
01580     uv_mutex_destroy(&async_lock);
01581 
01582     if (asyncdata_) {
01583       delete[] asyncdata_;
01584     }
01585   }
01586 
01587   void WorkProgress() {
01588     uv_mutex_lock(&async_lock);
01589     char *data = asyncdata_;
01590     size_t size = asyncsize_;
01591     asyncdata_ = NULL;
01592     uv_mutex_unlock(&async_lock);
01593 
01594     // Dont send progress events after we've already completed.
01595     if (callback) {
01596         HandleProgressCallback(data, size);
01597     }
01598     delete[] data;
01599   }
01600 
01601   class ExecutionProgress {
01602     friend class AsyncProgressWorker;
01603    public:
01604     // You could do fancy generics with templates here.
01605     void Send(const char* data, size_t size) const {
01606         that_->SendProgress_(data, size);
01607     }
01608 
01609    private:
01610     explicit ExecutionProgress(AsyncProgressWorker* that) : that_(that) {}
01611     NAN_DISALLOW_ASSIGN_COPY_MOVE(ExecutionProgress)
01612     AsyncProgressWorker* const that_;
01613   };
01614 
01615   virtual void Execute(const ExecutionProgress& progress) = 0;
01616   virtual void HandleProgressCallback(const char *data, size_t size) = 0;
01617 
01618   virtual void Destroy() {
01619       uv_close(reinterpret_cast<uv_handle_t*>(async), AsyncClose_);
01620   }
01621 
01622  private:
01623   void Execute() /*final override*/ {
01624       ExecutionProgress progress(this);
01625       Execute(progress);
01626   }
01627 
01628   void SendProgress_(const char *data, size_t size) {
01629     char *new_data = new char[size];
01630     memcpy(new_data, data, size);
01631 
01632     uv_mutex_lock(&async_lock);
01633     char *old_data = asyncdata_;
01634     asyncdata_ = new_data;
01635     asyncsize_ = size;
01636     uv_mutex_unlock(&async_lock);
01637 
01638     if (old_data) {
01639       delete[] old_data;
01640     }
01641     uv_async_send(async);
01642   }
01643 
01644   NAN_INLINE static NAUV_WORK_CB(AsyncProgress_) {
01645     AsyncProgressWorker *worker =
01646             static_cast<AsyncProgressWorker*>(async->data);
01647     worker->WorkProgress();
01648   }
01649 
01650   NAN_INLINE static void AsyncClose_(uv_handle_t* handle) {
01651     AsyncProgressWorker *worker =
01652             static_cast<AsyncProgressWorker*>(handle->data);
01653     delete reinterpret_cast<uv_async_t*>(handle);
01654     delete worker;
01655   }
01656 
01657   uv_async_t *async;
01658   uv_mutex_t async_lock;
01659   char *asyncdata_;
01660   size_t asyncsize_;
01661 };
01662 
01663 NAN_INLINE void AsyncExecute (uv_work_t* req) {
01664   AsyncWorker *worker = static_cast<AsyncWorker*>(req->data);
01665   worker->Execute();
01666 }
01667 
01668 NAN_INLINE void AsyncExecuteComplete (uv_work_t* req) {
01669   AsyncWorker* worker = static_cast<AsyncWorker*>(req->data);
01670   worker->WorkComplete();
01671   worker->Destroy();
01672 }
01673 
01674 NAN_INLINE void AsyncQueueWorker (AsyncWorker* worker) {
01675   uv_queue_work(
01676       uv_default_loop()
01677     , &worker->request
01678     , AsyncExecute
01679     , (uv_after_work_cb)AsyncExecuteComplete
01680   );
01681 }

01685 inline
01686 ExternalOneByteStringResource const*
01687 GetExternalResource(v8::Local<v8::String> str) {
01688 #if NODE_MODULE_VERSION < ATOM_0_21_MODULE_VERSION
01689     return str->GetExternalAsciiStringResource();
01690 #else
01691     return str->GetExternalOneByteStringResource();
01692 #endif
01693 }
01694 
01695 inline
01696 bool
01697 IsExternal(v8::Local<v8::String> str) {
01698 #if NODE_MODULE_VERSION < ATOM_0_21_MODULE_VERSION
01699     return str->IsExternalAscii();
01700 #else
01701     return str->IsExternalOneByte();
01702 #endif
01703 }

01706 
01707 enum Encoding {ASCII, UTF8, BASE64, UCS2, BINARY, HEX, BUFFER};
01708 
01709 #if NODE_MODULE_VERSION < NODE_0_10_MODULE_VERSION
01710 # include "nan_string_bytes.h"  // NOLINT(build/include)
01711 #endif
01712 
01713 NAN_INLINE v8::Local<v8::Value> Encode(
01714     const void *buf, size_t len, enum Encoding encoding = BINARY) {
01715 #if (NODE_MODULE_VERSION >= ATOM_0_21_MODULE_VERSION)
01716   v8::Isolate* isolate = v8::Isolate::GetCurrent();
01717   node::encoding node_enc = static_cast<node::encoding>(encoding);
01718 
01719   if (encoding == UCS2) {
01720     return node::Encode(
01721         isolate
01722       , reinterpret_cast<const uint16_t *>(buf)
01723       , len / 2);
01724   } else {
01725     return node::Encode(
01726         isolate
01727       , reinterpret_cast<const char *>(buf)
01728       , len
01729       , node_enc);
01730   }
01731 #elif (NODE_MODULE_VERSION > NODE_0_10_MODULE_VERSION)
01732   return node::Encode(
01733       v8::Isolate::GetCurrent()
01734     , buf, len
01735     , static_cast<node::encoding>(encoding));
01736 #else
01737 # if NODE_MODULE_VERSION >= NODE_0_10_MODULE_VERSION
01738   return node::Encode(buf, len, static_cast<node::encoding>(encoding));
01739 # else
01740   return imp::Encode(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(buf), len, encoding);
01741 # endif
01742 #endif
01743 }
01744 
01745 NAN_INLINE ssize_t DecodeBytes(
01746     v8::Local<v8::Value> val, enum Encoding encoding = BINARY) {
01747 #if (NODE_MODULE_VERSION > NODE_0_10_MODULE_VERSION)
01748   return node::DecodeBytes(
01749       v8::Isolate::GetCurrent()
01750     , val
01751     , static_cast<node::encoding>(encoding));
01752 #else
01753 # if (NODE_MODULE_VERSION < NODE_0_10_MODULE_VERSION)
01754   if (encoding == BUFFER) {
01755     return node::DecodeBytes(val, node::BINARY);
01756   }
01757 # endif
01758   return node::DecodeBytes(val, static_cast<node::encoding>(encoding));
01759 #endif
01760 }
01761 
01762 NAN_INLINE ssize_t DecodeWrite(
01763     char *buf
01764   , size_t len
01765   , v8::Local<v8::Value> val
01766   , enum Encoding encoding = BINARY) {
01767 #if (NODE_MODULE_VERSION > NODE_0_10_MODULE_VERSION)
01768   return node::DecodeWrite(
01769       v8::Isolate::GetCurrent()
01770     , buf
01771     , len
01772     , val
01773     , static_cast<node::encoding>(encoding));
01774 #else
01775 # if (NODE_MODULE_VERSION < NODE_0_10_MODULE_VERSION)
01776   if (encoding == BUFFER) {
01777     return node::DecodeWrite(buf, len, val, node::BINARY);
01778   }
01779 # endif
01780   return node::DecodeWrite(
01781       buf
01782     , len
01783     , val
01784     , static_cast<node::encoding>(encoding));
01785 #endif
01786 }

01822 template<typename T>
01823 NAN_INLINE void SetMethod(
01824     const T &recv
01825   , const char *name
01826   , FunctionCallback callback) {
01827   HandleScope scope;
01828   v8::Local<v8::Function> fn = GetFunction(New<v8::FunctionTemplate>(
01829       callback)).ToLocalChecked();
01830   v8::Local<v8::String> fn_name = New(name).ToLocalChecked();
01831   fn->SetName(fn_name);
01832   recv->Set(fn_name, fn);
01833 }
01834 
01835 NAN_INLINE void SetPrototypeMethod(
01836     v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> recv
01837   , const char* name, FunctionCallback callback) {
01838   HandleScope scope;
01839   v8::Local<v8::Function> fn = GetFunction(New<v8::FunctionTemplate>(
01840       callback
01841     , v8::Local<v8::Value>()
01842     , New<v8::Signature>(recv))).ToLocalChecked();
01843   v8::Local<v8::String> fn_name = New(name).ToLocalChecked();
01844   recv->PrototypeTemplate()->Set(fn_name, fn);
01845   fn->SetName(fn_name);
01846 }
01847 
01848 //=== Accessors and Such =======================================================
01849 
01850 inline void SetAccessor(
01851     v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> tpl
01852   , v8::Local<v8::String> name
01853   , GetterCallback getter
01854   , SetterCallback setter = 0
01855   , v8::Local<v8::Value> data = v8::Local<v8::Value>()
01856   , v8::AccessControl settings = v8::DEFAULT
01857   , v8::PropertyAttribute attribute = v8::None
01858   , imp::Sig signature = imp::Sig()) {
01859   HandleScope scope;
01860 
01861   imp::NativeGetter getter_ =
01862       imp::GetterCallbackWrapper;
01863   imp::NativeSetter setter_ =
01864       setter ? imp::SetterCallbackWrapper : 0;
01865 
01866   v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> otpl = New<v8::ObjectTemplate>();
01867   otpl->SetInternalFieldCount(imp::kAccessorFieldCount);
01868   v8::Local<v8::Object> obj = NewInstance(otpl).ToLocalChecked();
01869 
01870   obj->SetInternalField(
01871       imp::kGetterIndex
01872     , New<v8::External>(reinterpret_cast<void *>(getter)));
01873 
01874   if (setter != 0) {
01875     obj->SetInternalField(
01876         imp::kSetterIndex
01877       , New<v8::External>(reinterpret_cast<void *>(setter)));
01878   }
01879 
01880   if (!data.IsEmpty()) {
01881     obj->SetInternalField(imp::kDataIndex, data);
01882   }
01883 
01884   tpl->SetAccessor(
01885       name
01886     , getter_
01887     , setter_
01888     , obj
01889     , settings
01890     , attribute
01891     , signature);
01892 }
01893 
01894 inline bool SetAccessor(
01895     v8::Local<v8::Object> obj
01896   , v8::Local<v8::String> name
01897   , GetterCallback getter
01898   , SetterCallback setter = 0
01899   , v8::Local<v8::Value> data = v8::Local<v8::Value>()
01900   , v8::AccessControl settings = v8::DEFAULT
01901   , v8::PropertyAttribute attribute = v8::None) {
01902   EscapableHandleScope scope;
01903 
01904   imp::NativeGetter getter_ =
01905       imp::GetterCallbackWrapper;
01906   imp::NativeSetter setter_ =
01907       setter ? imp::SetterCallbackWrapper : 0;
01908 
01909   v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> otpl = New<v8::ObjectTemplate>();
01910   otpl->SetInternalFieldCount(imp::kAccessorFieldCount);
01911   v8::Local<v8::Object> dataobj = NewInstance(otpl).ToLocalChecked();
01912 
01913   dataobj->SetInternalField(
01914       imp::kGetterIndex
01915     , New<v8::External>(reinterpret_cast<void *>(getter)));
01916 
01917   if (!data.IsEmpty()) {
01918     dataobj->SetInternalField(imp::kDataIndex, data);
01919   }
01920 
01921   if (setter) {
01922     dataobj->SetInternalField(
01923         imp::kSetterIndex
01924       , New<v8::External>(reinterpret_cast<void *>(setter)));
01925   }
01926 
01927   return obj->SetAccessor(
01928       name
01929     , getter_
01930     , setter_
01931     , dataobj
01932     , settings
01933     , attribute);
01934 }
01935 
01936 inline void SetNamedPropertyHandler(
01937     v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> tpl
01938   , PropertyGetterCallback getter
01939   , PropertySetterCallback setter = 0
01940   , PropertyQueryCallback query = 0
01941   , PropertyDeleterCallback deleter = 0
01942   , PropertyEnumeratorCallback enumerator = 0
01943   , v8::Local<v8::Value> data = v8::Local<v8::Value>()) {
01944   HandleScope scope;
01945 
01946   imp::NativePropertyGetter getter_ =
01947       imp::PropertyGetterCallbackWrapper;
01948   imp::NativePropertySetter setter_ =
01949       setter ? imp::PropertySetterCallbackWrapper : 0;
01950   imp::NativePropertyQuery query_ =
01951       query ? imp::PropertyQueryCallbackWrapper : 0;
01952   imp::NativePropertyDeleter *deleter_ =
01953       deleter ? imp::PropertyDeleterCallbackWrapper : 0;
01954   imp::NativePropertyEnumerator enumerator_ =
01955       enumerator ? imp::PropertyEnumeratorCallbackWrapper : 0;
01956 
01957   v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> otpl = New<v8::ObjectTemplate>();
01958   otpl->SetInternalFieldCount(imp::kPropertyFieldCount);
01959   v8::Local<v8::Object> obj = NewInstance(otpl).ToLocalChecked();
01960   obj->SetInternalField(
01961       imp::kPropertyGetterIndex
01962     , New<v8::External>(reinterpret_cast<void *>(getter)));
01963 
01964   if (setter) {
01965     obj->SetInternalField(
01966         imp::kPropertySetterIndex
01967       , New<v8::External>(reinterpret_cast<void *>(setter)));
01968   }
01969 
01970   if (query) {
01971     obj->SetInternalField(
01972         imp::kPropertyQueryIndex
01973       , New<v8::External>(reinterpret_cast<void *>(query)));
01974   }
01975 
01976   if (deleter) {
01977     obj->SetInternalField(
01978         imp::kPropertyDeleterIndex
01979       , New<v8::External>(reinterpret_cast<void *>(deleter)));
01980   }
01981 
01982   if (enumerator) {
01983     obj->SetInternalField(
01984         imp::kPropertyEnumeratorIndex
01985       , New<v8::External>(reinterpret_cast<void *>(enumerator)));
01986   }
01987 
01988   if (!data.IsEmpty()) {
01989     obj->SetInternalField(imp::kDataIndex, data);
01990   }
01991 
01992 #if NODE_MODULE_VERSION > NODE_0_12_MODULE_VERSION
01993   tpl->SetHandler(v8::NamedPropertyHandlerConfiguration(
01994       getter_, setter_, query_, deleter_, enumerator_, obj));
01995 #else
01996   tpl->SetNamedPropertyHandler(
01997       getter_
01998     , setter_
01999     , query_
02000     , deleter_
02001     , enumerator_
02002     , obj);
02003 #endif
02004 }

02006 inline void SetIndexedPropertyHandler(
02007     v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> tpl
02008   , IndexGetterCallback getter
02009   , IndexSetterCallback setter = 0
02010   , IndexQueryCallback query = 0
02011   , IndexDeleterCallback deleter = 0
02012   , IndexEnumeratorCallback enumerator = 0
02013   , v8::Local<v8::Value> data = v8::Local<v8::Value>()) {
02014   HandleScope scope;
02015 
02016   imp::NativeIndexGetter getter_ =
02017       imp::IndexGetterCallbackWrapper;
02018   imp::NativeIndexSetter setter_ =
02019       setter ? imp::IndexSetterCallbackWrapper : 0;
02020   imp::NativeIndexQuery query_ =
02021       query ? imp::IndexQueryCallbackWrapper : 0;
02022   imp::NativeIndexDeleter deleter_ =
02023       deleter ? imp::IndexDeleterCallbackWrapper : 0;
02024   imp::NativeIndexEnumerator enumerator_ =
02025       enumerator ? imp::IndexEnumeratorCallbackWrapper : 0;
02026 
02027   v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> otpl = New<v8::ObjectTemplate>();
02028   otpl->SetInternalFieldCount(imp::kIndexPropertyFieldCount);
02029   v8::Local<v8::Object> obj = NewInstance(otpl).ToLocalChecked();
02030   obj->SetInternalField(
02031       imp::kIndexPropertyGetterIndex
02032     , New<v8::External>(reinterpret_cast<void *>(getter)));
02033 
02034   if (setter) {
02035     obj->SetInternalField(
02036         imp::kIndexPropertySetterIndex
02037       , New<v8::External>(reinterpret_cast<void *>(setter)));
02038   }
02039 
02040   if (query) {
02041     obj->SetInternalField(
02042         imp::kIndexPropertyQueryIndex
02043       , New<v8::External>(reinterpret_cast<void *>(query)));
02044   }
02045 
02046   if (deleter) {
02047     obj->SetInternalField(
02048         imp::kIndexPropertyDeleterIndex
02049       , New<v8::External>(reinterpret_cast<void *>(deleter)));
02050   }
02051

02053     obj->SetInternalField(
02054         imp::kIndexPropertyEnumeratorIndex
02055       , New<v8::External>(reinterpret_cast<void *>(enumerator)));
02056   }
02057

02059     obj->SetInternalField(imp::kDataIndex, data);
02060   }
02061 
02062 #if NODE_MODULE_VERSION > NODE_0_12_MODULE_VERSION

02064       getter_, setter_, query_, deleter_, enumerator_, obj));
02065 #else

02067       getter_

02084 //=== Export ==================================================================
02085 
02086 inline
02087 void
02088 Export(ADDON_REGISTER_FUNCTION_ARGS_TYPE target, const char *name,
02089     FunctionCallback f) {
02090   Set(target, New<v8::String>(name).ToLocalChecked(),
02091       GetFunction(New<v8::FunctionTemplate>(f)).ToLocalChecked());
02092 }
02093 
02094 //=== Tap Reverse Binding =====================================================
02095 
02096 struct Tap {
02097   explicit Tap(v8::Local<v8::Value> t) : t_() {
02098     t_.Reset(To<v8::Object>(t).ToLocalChecked());
02099   }
02100 
02101   ~Tap() { t_.Reset(); }  // not sure if neccessary
02102 
02103   inline void plan(int i) {
02104     v8::Local<v8::Value> arg = New(i);
02105     MakeCallback(New(t_), "plan", 1, &arg);
02106   }
02107 
02108   inline void ok(bool isOk, const char *msg = NULL) {
02109     v8::Local<v8::Value> args[2];
02110     args[0] = New(isOk);
02111     if (msg) args[1] = New(msg).ToLocalChecked();
02112     MakeCallback(New(t_), "ok", msg ? 2 : 1, args);
02113   }
02114 
02115   inline void pass(const char * msg = NULL) {
02116     v8::Local<v8::Value> hmsg;
02117     if (msg) hmsg = New(msg).ToLocalChecked();
02118     MakeCallback(New(t_), "pass", msg ? 1 : 0, &hmsg);
02119   }
02120 
02121  private:
02122   Persistent<v8::Object> t_;
02123 };

02125 #define NAN_STRINGIZE2(x) #x
02126 #define NAN_STRINGIZE(x) NAN_STRINGIZE2(x)
02127 #define NAN_TEST_EXPRESSION(expression) \
02128   ( expression ), __FILE__ ":" NAN_STRINGIZE(__LINE__) ": " #expression
02129 
02130 #define NAN_EXPORT(target, function) Export(target, #function, function)
